Author: walker.reynolds
Content: My opinion, this server is for realtime collaboration and sharing of ideas.  We need to discourage active selling and active business development on the server (or provide a channel just for that purpose that people can mute if they so choose) or else we will drive away the community and be left with nothing but a bunch of BD guys trying to sell to one another.

Author: walker.reynolds
Content: Mission: To create a platform for realtime collaboration and sharing of ideas in the Industry 4.0 and IIoT community.

Author: walker.reynolds
Content: Rule 1: The Golden Rule (treat others as you want to be treated)

Author: walker.reynolds
Content: Rule 2: No unsolicited, active selling or business development.  We want the community to feel free to share ideas and issues without fear of being inundated with messages designed to sell them something.

Author: walker.reynolds
Content: Rule 3: Contribute!  Share your thoughts, your ideas, ask your questions, generate dialogue!

Author: walker.reynolds
Content: Rule 4: Make friends and have fun!
